title: Visio: New stencil for shapes in your document in Visio for the web for GCC, GCC-High, and DoD [Visio Plan 2]
description: This release extends the availability of the new stencil for shapes in your document in Visio for the web (feature ID 68375) to GCC, GCC-High, DoD, and other sovereign clouds. The new Shapes in the Document stencil automatically saves the shapes you've added to your diagram, so you can quickly access them and use them again without having to search through multiple stencils. This feature will be available for users with a Visio Plan 2 license.
